appShowcase.title: Shopify Scrolling Text Section
appShowcase.description: Add moving text banners to your Shopify store to highlight offers, announcements, or important messages. The Scrolling Text section helps draw attention without interrupting the browsing experience and fits naturally into modern storefront layouts.

ctaButton.text: Hire a Shopify developer to add this section

mainContent.heading: What is the Scrolling Text Section?
paragraphs: The Scrolling Text section allows you to display horizontally moving text banners that keep important messages visible without cluttering your store layout.
It is ideal for promoting sales, new arrivals, announcements, or time-sensitive updates while maintaining a clean and professional storefront appearance.
The section integrates smoothly into any Shopify theme and offers flexible controls to match your brand style and messaging needs.

features.title: Scrolling Speed
features.description: Control the speed of the scrolling text and optionally pause the animation on hover.

features.title: Direction Options
features.description: Choose the scrolling direction, from left to right or right to left.

features.title: Image or SVG Support
features.description: Add images or SVG elements alongside text with adjustable sizing.

features.title: Clickable Text Links
features.description: Insert clickable links within the scrolling text, with an option to open in a new tab.
